text: Boiry-Notre-Dame is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de- France region in northern France. ==Geography== Boiry-Notre-Dame is a farming village located 10 miles (16 km) southeast of Arras on the D34 road. ==Population== ==Sights== * The church of St. Vaast, rebuilt after the destruction of the village during World War I. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Boiry-Notre-Dame
